metadata.title: CVE-2023-6510 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in Media Capture in Google Chrome prior to 120.0.6099.62allowed a remote attacker who convinced a user to engage in specific UIinteraction to potentially exploit heap corruption via specific UIinteraction. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
